    I

    image - Variable in class object.SuperObject
     
    indestructibleTile - Variable in class model.GamePanel
     
    IndestructibleTile - Class in model
    The main.IndestructibleTile class represents a permanent wall or barrier that cannot be destroyed by bombs and never becomes walkable.
    IndestructibleTile(int, int) - Constructor for class model.IndestructibleTile
    Constructs an indestructible tile at the specified board position.
    initializeTiles() - Method in class model.GameModel
    Initializes the tiles[][] array from the original GameModel.inputMap.
    isDead() - Method in class model.drone
    Returns whether the drone is currently dead.
    isDeathExpired() - Method in class model.drone
    Determines whether the death animation (death sprite) has finished showing.
    isDrawnThisFrame() - Method in class model.Hero
    Used by GamePanel to determine whether the hero should be drawn this frame.
    isExploded() - Method in class model.WalkingBomb
     
    isInstructionShown() - Method in class model.PowerUp
    Checks whether the instructional message for this power-up has already been displayed to the player.
    isInvulnerable() - Method in class model.Hero
    Returns whether the hero is currently invulnerable.
    isPicked() - Method in class model.PowerUp
    Returns whether this power-up has already been picked up by the hero.
    isPowered() - Method in class model.Bomba
    Returns whether the bomb was placed while the player had a radius powerup.
    isWalkable - Variable in class object.SuperObject
     
    isWalkable() - Method in class model.BarrierTile
    Returns whether the tile is currently walkable.
    isWalkable() - Method in class model.DestructibleTile
    Returns whether this tile can currently be walked on.
    isWalkable() - Method in class model.IndestructibleTile
    Returns whether this tile can currently be walked on.
    isWalkable() - Method in class model.Tile
    Returns whether entities (hero, drones, bombs, etc.) can walk onto this tile.
    isWalkable() - Method in class model.WalkableTile
    Indicates whether this tile is currently walkable by the hero or other entities.
